$schema.description: The path to the Orbit It schema file

type.description: The type of project to manage

envFilePath.description: The path to the environment file. This file contains environment variables used by the project.

strategy.description: The release strategy to use. Auto means releases are managed automatically, manual means you control when releases happen.

versioningStrategy.description: The versioning strategy to use. Fixed means all packages share the same version, independent means each package can have its own version.

preReleaseIdentifier.description: An optional pre-release identifier to append to versions, e.g., "alpha", "beta", etc.
